casebody.data:
William Y. Mortimer, et al., as Executors, etc., Respondents v. The Manhattan Railway Company, Appellants. Decided March 2, 1891. This is an appeal from a judgment entered upon a verdict of a jury, and from an order denying a motion for a new trial, and also from two other orders that were 'entered during the progress of the action. Davies & Rapallo, for appellant. John W. Pirsson, for respondents.

Before Truax and Dugro, JJ.

Per Curiam.

Judgment and orders affirmed, with costs.
